description: This file is a command-line interface script for applying the 'loose-envify' transformation to input files or standard input streams. It uses Node.js modules 'fs' and a local 'loose-envify' module to process environment variables in source code.

methods.name: require
methods.description: Loads external (fs) and local ('./') modules needed for file processing and environment variable substitution.

methods.name: createReadStream
methods.description: Creates a readable stream from a file specified by process.argv[2].

methods.name: pipe
methods.description: Chains streams for processing files or standard input/output.

methods.name: resume
methods.description: Resumes reading from stdin if no filename argument is provided.
